contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Oshika'''|牡鹿郡|Oshika-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Miyagi Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 16,069 and a [[population density]] of 115.80 persons per km². The total area is 138.76 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Onagawa, Miyagi|Onagawa]] ==Merger== *On April 1, 2005 the town of [[Oshika, Miyagi|Oshika]] merged with the towns of [[Kahoku, Miyagi|Kahoku]], [[Kanan, Miyagi|Kanan]], [[Kitakami, Miyagi|Kitakami]], [[Monou, Miyagi|Monou]], and [[Ogatsu, Miyagi|Ogatsu]], all from [[Monou District, Miyagi|Monou District]], and Ishinomaki City to form a larger new [[Ishinomaki, Miyagi|Ishinomaki City]]. {{Miyagi}} {{coord|38|27|11|N|141|26|42|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Miyagi Prefecture]] {{Miyagi-geo-stub}}
